Name: Space Trade Fleet 1.5
About the game: Artificial Intelligence mechanical race (that we made) has taken over our star system. We have to build even trade into a heavily armed fleet. Assemble the spaceship. Raise funds by transporting trade items. A total of 10 planets should be funded to complete the colonial construction quest. features : - Automatic shooting system for lazy gamers - A shooting game with a head, not a hand - 7 space ship slots for fleet - 5 different space ship hulls - A total of 31 parts for assembling space ship - 4 different super weapon parts for user's control - A total of ten trading planets - Each planet has three difficulties depending on the number of trade items it carries - a total of 30 enemy stages that can be played back indefinitely. - A total of 14 offensive and defensive passive skills that can be level-up with special resources - 10 fun songs background music composed by Zeta Heo - An infinite combination of space ship and skill that can break through higher difficulty levels - Rewards that increase exponentially as difficulty increases - Try a level-up and try the top-rated stage of the last planet!
